/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the highway, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The highway itself is a concrete structure, with a guardrail running along its right side, ensuring the safety of the drivers. On the left side of the highway, there are trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of looking up at the sky and the buildings in the distance. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the green of the trees and the gray of the concrete highway. The image does not provide any specific details that could be used to identify the exact location of this landmark.
